name: enr
description: 一个 earthnut 的 react ui

scripts.build:analyze: jja rm dist stats.json &&  dev_mode=development  webpack --config ./webpack.config.mjs.js --profile --json > stats.json && webpack-bundle-analyzer stats.json && jja rm stats.json
scripts.build:scss: sass --no-source-map --style=compressed src/css/common.scss dist/styles/common.css && sass --no-source-map --style=compressed src/css/reset.scss dist/styles/reset.css
